amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. ___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Department of Justice to be a party to a single or multistate court settlement where funds are removed from any residential mortgagebacked securitization trust.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Department of Justice to be a party to a single or multi-state court settlement where funds are removed from any residential mortgage-backed securitization trust.
